Trevor Ariza

Pronunciation: \A-Ree-Zah\

Trevor Anthony Ariza ▪ Instagram: trevrizza1

(Switchblade)

Position: Small Forward and Shooting Guard ▪ Shoots: Right

6-8, 215lb (203cm, 97kg)

Born: June 30, 1985 in Miami, Florida us

College: UCLA

High School: Westchester in Los Angeles, California

Recruiting Rank: 2003 (19)

Draft: New York Knicks, 2nd round (14th pick, 43rd overall), 2004 NBA Draft

NBA Debut: November 3, 2004

Career Length: 18 years

Frequently Asked Questions

How old is Trevor Ariza?

Trevor Ariza is 39 years old.

Where was Trevor Ariza born?

Trevor Ariza was born in Miami, Florida.

When was Trevor Ariza born?

Trevor Ariza was born on June 30, 1985.

How tall is Trevor Ariza?

Trevor Ariza is 6-8 (203 cm) tall.

How much did Trevor Ariza weigh when playing?

Trevor Ariza weighed 215 lbs (97 kg) when playing.

Is Trevor Ariza in the Hall of Fame?

Trevor Ariza is not in the Hall of Fame.

When was Trevor Ariza drafted?

Trevor Ariza was drafted by New York Knicks, 2nd round (14th pick, 43rd overall), 2004 NBA Draft.

What position did Trevor Ariza play?

Small Forward and Shooting Guard.

When did Trevor Ariza retire?

Trevor Ariza last played in 2022.

What is Trevor Ariza's net worth?

Trevor Ariza made at least $118,962,221 playing professional basketball.

How much did Trevor Ariza make?

Trevor Ariza made $15,000,000 in 2019.

What did Trevor Ariza average?

Trevor Ariza averaged 10.4 points, 4.8 rebounds, and 2.1 assists per game.

How many rings does Trevor Ariza have?

Trevor Ariza won one championship.

What is Trevor Ariza's Twitter account?

Trevor Ariza is on Twitter at TrevorAriza.

What is Trevor Ariza's Instagram account?

Trevor Ariza is on Instagram at trevrizza1.

What schools did Trevor Ariza attend?

Trevor Ariza attended Westchester in Los Angeles, California and UCLA.

What are Trevor Ariza's nicknames?

Switchblade is a nickname for Trevor Ariza.
